title: Python Django Developer
responsibilities: Write effective, scalable code
Develop back-end components to improve responsiveness and overall performance
Integrate user-facing elements into applications
Test and debug programs
Improve functionality of existing systems
Implement security and data protection solutions
Assess and prioritize feature requests
Coordinate with internal teams to understand user requirements and provide technical solutions
skills: Work experience as a Python Developer
Expertise in at least one popular Python framework (like Django, Machine Learning)
Knowledge of object-relational mapping (ORM)
Familiarity with front-end technologies (JavaScript, HTML5)
Team spirit
Good problem-solving skills
BSc in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field

title: Business Development Executive
responsibilities: Generate and qualify leads through cold calls, emails, and networking
Develop and execute sales strategies to acquire new clients
Build strong, long-lasting client relationships
Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to align strategies
Track sales progress and adjust strategies to meet targets
Conduct market research to identify trends and opportunities
Present product/service offerings effectively to potential clients
Negotiate contracts and close deals
Attend networking events and industry conferences
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and competitors
skills: Motivated self-starter with strong leadership skills
Excellent verbal and written communication
Ability to identify new growth opportunities
Experience in documentation for business development
Proficiency in English preferred

title: Android Developer
responsibilities: Conceptualize and formulate Android apps
Implement measures to safeguard users' data
Ensure construction and presentation of apps meets standards
Proofread and debug code before release
Collaborate with UI/UX designers and testers
Liaise with marketing for brand consistency
Monitor app reviews for improvements
Create app updates including bug fixes and new features
skills: BS/MS degree in Computer Science or related field
Proficiency in Java, C, or C++
Experience with Android Studio and SDK
Strong coding and proofreading skills
Excellent teamwork and communication skills
Ability to work independently

title: Flutter Developer
responsibilities: Translate requirements into clean, efficient code
Construct base engine for applications
Produce prototypes of features
Develop schedules and determine milestones
Generate scripts and storyboards
Animate characters and objects
Contribute to design and audio features
Create unit tests and validation procedures
Polish code, fix bugs, maintain performance
skills: Experience in full lifecycle app/game development
Hands-on with C++, Java, or similar
Knowledge of APIs and libraries
Expertise in AI, 3D rendering, networking, or audio
Strong creative problem-solving skills
Degree in Computer Science or Games Technology

title: MERN Stack Developer
responsibilities: Design and build applications based on requirements
Develop front-end and back-end using Node, MongoDB, React/Angular, Express
Unit test for robustness and reliability
Write reusable, maintainable code
Integrate existing business tools
Create dynamic web pages
Mentor junior developers and review code
skills: Strong problem-solving skills
Knowledge of data structures and algorithms
Passion for robust, high-quality systems
Experience with RESTful APIs
Experience with Firebase and push notifications
Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Experience with GraphQL a plus

title: UI/UX Designer
responsibilities: Proven UI/UX experience with a strong portfolio
Strong English communication skills
Understand user-centered design principles
Design responsive web and mobile solutions
Strong problem-solving and visual skills
Manage multiple projects with deadlines
skills: Lead design process from concept to delivery
Collaborate with cross-functional teams
Conduct user research and gather feedback
Develop and maintain design systems
Stay updated with latest UI/UX trends and tools

title: AI/ML Developer
responsibilities: Design and deploy scalable ML models and AI algorithms
Collaborate with teams to define use cases
Preprocess data and perform feature engineering
Train, test, and optimize models
Monitor and maintain ML pipelines
Document workflows and results
Stay updated with latest AI/ML research
skills: Proficiency in Python and ML libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, XGBoost)
Data manipulation with Pandas, NumPy, SQL
Knowledge of evaluation metrics
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Strong problem-solving and communication skills

title: QA Tester
responsibilities: Test gameplay, features, and levels for bugs
Report and track bugs using tools
Work closely with developers for fixes
Verify fixes and updates
skills: Attention to detail and analytical thinking
Familiarity with bug-tracking tools (Jira, Trello)
Basic knowledge of software testing
Understanding of gaming platforms
Strong written and verbal communication
